entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
